nodes.text: The Biosteady Smartmonitor was a model of Bio-Support Dispenser produced by Arakyd Industries. They were able to be integrated into armor, which enhanced the effects of in-combat treatments through carefully regulated and distributed dosages.
The Biosteady Smartmonitor was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
